original_text: Foreign people who live among you will become stronger and stronger. They will have more and more power over you, as you become weaker.
korean_text: 너의 중에 우거하는 이방인은 점점 높아져서 네 위에 뛰어나고 너는 점점 낮아질 것이며

sentences.original_text: Foreign people who live among you
They will have more and more power over you
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 너희에게 점점 더 많은 권세를 가질 것이라
